meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Mark Weston Jordan Lorence Dan Deacon Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1675.

td.p: Mark Weston, a writer from Armonk, New York
Jordan Lorence, a lawyer originally from Minneapolis, Minnesota
Dan Deacon, a senior marketing and business analyst from Wilkes-Barre, Pennsylvania (whose 2-day cash winnings total $20,501)

tr.td: EXPLORERS
MEDICINE
SPORTS LEGENDS
FOOD & DRINK
DESIGN
SALUTES & SALUTATIONS

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Garcia Lopez de Cardenas led the first Europeans to see this Arizona wonder on the Colorado River')

tr.td: Garcia Lopez de Cardenas led the first Europeans to see this Arizona wonder on the Colorado River

div.onmouseout:
toggle('clue_J_6_4', 'clue_J_6_4_stuck', 'Fictional African explorer heard here:

"Hello, I must be going /
I cannot stay, I came to say, I must be going /
I\'m glad I came, but just the same I must be going /
I\'ll stay a week or two /
I\'ll stay the summer thru...')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td:
Fictional African explorer heard here:
"Hello, I must be going /
I cannot stay, I came to say, I must be going /
I'm glad I came, but just the same I must be going /
I'll stay a week or two /
I'll stay the summer thru...

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Mark] You didn\'t want to write "Alexander"? That\'s okay, it\'s a correct response.)
JordanWhat is the Bugle Boy of Company B?
$0
MarkWhat is Alex\'s Ragtime Band?
$8,300
DanWhat are the Boogie Woogie Bugle Boys?
$7,001
Alexander\'s Ragtime Band')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'According to Irving Berlin, "They can play a bugle call like you never heard before"')

tr.td: SONG STANDARDS
According to Irving Berlin, "They can play a bugle call like you never heard before"
Dan
Jordan
Mark
2nd place: a trip on Delta to Hartford, Connecticut with stay at Sheraton Sturbridge Resort
3rd place: a Formosa drinking water system + NES with Super Jeopardy! + Wheel of Fortune + InfoGenius pak for Game Boy
New champion: $16,600
Dan
Jordan
Mark

25 R
(including 1 DD),
2 W

6 R,
1 W

23 R
(including 1 DD),
4 W
(including 1 DD)
